full_summary:
SQS Field Camp Catering – Sidney Island, BC
------------------------------------------

### Solicitation Number and Overview

The Solicitation Number for this opportunity is 5P420-23-0062/A. Parks Canada invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of catering services for a field camp on Sidney Island in Gulf Island National Park. This Invitation to Tender (ITT) seeks an experienced camp cook with an enclosed cooking trailer and the necessary equipment to prepare meals for a 5-month period, with an additional 1-year option.

### Eligibility and Requirements

* The Respondent must be experienced in providing catering services for field camps.
* The camp cook must possess an enclosed cooking trailer with the necessary equipment.
* A five-month contract is anticipated, with an option to extend the contract by 1 year.

### Period of Contract

The Contract Period will run from the date of contract signing to April 15, 2024, inclusive. Parks Canada reserves the right to exercise an option to extend the Contract by 1 additional year from April 16, 2024, to April 30, 2025, under the same conditions.

### Bid Submission Requirements

* Electronic bids can be submitted via email to [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca).
* Bids must be submitted as attachments, not links.
* The maximum email file size accepted is 15 megabytes.
* A breakdown of the bid must be included in the submission.

### Important Dates

* Closing Date: September 19, 2023, at 16:00 hrs.
* Bidders must allow sufficient time for bid submission and response.

### Selection Criteria and Evaluation

The evaluation will be based on the criteria outlined in the ITT. Respondents are advised to carefully review the requirements before submitting a proposal.

### Document and File Retrieval

Bidders can access the ITT and related documents through the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [http://canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

### Questions and Clarifications

Technical and contractual inquires shall be submitted to the Contracting Authority and must be received at least 7 calendar days prior to the closing date.

### Additional Information

The work must comply with the National Parks Regulations and ordinances.
